thread.title: Mother campaigns to raise awareness of sepsis after being told daughter may die
thread.title_full: Mother campaigns to raise awareness of sepsis after being told daughter may die | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Mother campaigns to raise awareness of sepsis after being told daughter may die
text:
Doctors thought Phoebe might die after she developed sepsis Credit: Family A mother from Merseyside whose daughter almost died from the deadly infection sepsis is warning other parents that the condition can kill.
100 people in our region die every week from sepsis Doctors told Hayley Lewis to expect the worst when her daughter Phoebe developed the illness.
"I just don't think they promote sepsis enough. It's a killer, it kills people. I want people to be aware. I want people to know."
â€“ Hayley Lewis Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017 Merseyside
